update user_wallet a,shop_supplier b ,shop_order_goods c ,shop_goods d SET a.froze_rmb_amnt = a.froze_rmb_amnt + d.cost_price where 1=1 and a.user_id = b.user_id and b.id = c.supplier_id and c.goods_id = d.goods_id and c.shop_order_no = #{shop_order_no}

update user_wallet a,store_info b,store_order_info c SET a.froze_wlbi_amnt = a.froze_wlbi_amnt + c.order_amount where 1=1 and a.user_id = b.user_id and b.store_id = c.store_id and c.store_order_sn = #{store_order_sn}

update user_wallet a,shop_supplier b ,shop_order_goods c ,shop_goods d set a.froze_rmb_amnt = a.froze_rmb_amnt - d.cost_price, a.money = a.money + d.cost_price where 1=1 and a.user_id = b.user_id and b.id = c.supplier_id and c.goods_id = d.goods_id and a.froze_rmb_amnt >= d.cost_price and c.shop_order_no = #{shop_order_no}
